name: Stabby Santa
description:
It’s that time of the year again for Santa to don his ex-beret covert ops gear and personally murder everybody on his Naughty List!

  • The player controls a icicle-knife wielding Santa

  • Navigate an indoor scene crawling with NPCs.

  • Move with WASD/Arrows and stab with M1.

  • Stabs will only kill if aimed at the back hitbox of the enemies (think TF2 backstabs)

  • NPCs have line of sight, and will be alerted if they spot you
